scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd client && npm run build" "cd server && npm run server"
scripts.start: npm run build && cd server && node server.js
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i

comments.comment-start:dev: TODO: This script is used during development to rebuild the client-side code and start the server at the same time.
comments.comment-concurrently: TODO: The 'concurrently' package allows us to run multiple commands in parallel. This is useful in the 'start:dev' script, which runs both the client-side and server-side code at the same time.
